scripts-description.postinstall: The script runs the build process of the Form Field Extension JS after running npm install command
scripts-description.start: The script runs built Form Field Extension JS inside Workbench that emulates WEBCON BPS Modern Form where you can easily test your extensions to speed up development
scripts-description.publish-sdk: The script generates manifest.json file of the Form Field Extension JS on the fly and creates the installation package ready to import in WEBCON BPS Designer Studio
